name: Aces High (itch)
description:
Aces High is a test project I made to learn how to use RPG Maker, so the whole game uses assets from the RPG Maker program. No additional custom assets were used; just whatever came with the software.

The story is about a student of Ace Academy, a school that educates and trains up-and-coming adventurers, explorers and scholars. The student, Zura, goes on various missions assigned by the academy to test her abilities as a new adventurer.

Controls:
Enter/Z - Confirm
Esc/X - Cancel & Open Menu
Arrow Keys - Movement
Q - Previous Page
W - Next Page

This build currently up for download is to show off what I've managed to create so far. Mainly want feedback on balancing issues but any criticism would be nice. Please let me know of any typos, glitches, broken stuff, etc. Also, please forgive the cheesy and awful writing; I am not a storyteller by any means, but this is good practice.

Thank you and I hope you enjoy.
